channel.title: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!
channel.description: Can Someone Please Help? I am Really Stuck. :confused:

item.title: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

[quote=“mod robby, post:4, topic:103082”]Hehe simple… First get a server…(of course) then go to the NPC handler.java and search what one of the dudes say above there head then go to the } bellow it and put this in your form:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE) { if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "CODE HERE!"; } } [/quote]

What I posted, but more explained :]

Read full topic

item.title: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!
item.dc:creator: @Reforced _Reforced
item.description:
@Reforced wrote:

do npchandler.java and hit ctrl+F for an example and npc would say “Sell your junk here!” so you would search sell your junk and change wat it says in quotes to whatev you want.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!

item.title: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

Hehe simple… First get a server…(of course) then go to the NPC handler.java and search what one of the dudes say above there head then go to the } bellow it and put this in your form:

if (npcs[i].npcType == NPC ID HERE) {
if (misc.random2(30) <= 3) {
npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
npcs[i].textUpdate = "CODE HERE!";
}
}

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!

item.title: Need Help Making Npcs have messages over heads!
item.dc:creator: @pur3_pik3r_9 pur3 pik3r 9
item.description:
@pur3_pik3r_9 wrote:

if (npcs[i].npcType == 1781) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get your capes! Trade me.."; }
